Billabonks are blue frogs that inhabits the
2nd Layer. It is usually found hopping and swimming near rivers or other bodies of water.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: Billabonks are passive creatures and will normally aim to flee from Delvers by leaping away. It uses its poisonous sac to spew a weak acid onto its attackers and prey. It will also extends its tongue to eat bugs and insects flying around it. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: The
legs of Billabonks can be consumed as food, but will not fill hunger unlike Ottobas Meat. One can also harvest their
acid sacs which can be used in several recipies.
:hypers:
